LAML-Pro documentation
======================

**LAML-Pro** or Lineage Analysis via Maximum Likelihood with Probabilistic Observations is a Python library for jointly infering cell genotype assignments and the cell lineage tree. It builds on LAML.

.. note::
   This project is under active development.

Contents 
----------------------
.. toctree::
   usage
   modules
